flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36.0>>36.0 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36.0=$<<120+36.0=151.0>>151.0
So he makes 151.0*25=$<<151.0*25=3775.0>>3775.0 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 3775.0*4=$<<3775.0*4=15100.0>>15100.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 156.0, not 151.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
